short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays USA Target Skills Scores and AMTS values on HattrickPortal Tracker pages. User must have access to player skills.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 0.1.0 - Initial release.
Version 0.2.0 - All positions available.
Version 0.2.1 - Target skills modified to be based on sector weights.
Version 0.3.0 - AMTS values added.
Version 0.3.1 - Training comparison now based on HTP training calculator.
Version 0.4.0 - AMTS values now displayed on scout lists in HTP.
Version 0.4.1 - Typos on player page corrected.
Version 0.5.0 - AMTS scores now appear on scout player search pages (pages showing players who meet NT and U20 requirements).
Version 0.5.1 - Adds the information to domain root player pages not in the Tracker directory.
Version 0.5.2 - Improved positional target scores more accurately reflect sector contributions.
Version 0.6.0 - Added NTP (National Team Player) scores for players over 21.
